questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A building
B) A tree
C) A sign
D) A person

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A tree trunk
C) A sign
D) A bench

What is written on the sign?
A) "Welcome"
B) "GROOT"
C) "Tree"
D) "Park

What type of tree is mentioned on the sign?
A) Oak
B) Pine
C) American Elm
D) Maple

What colors are predominantly on the sign?
A) Red and yellow
B) Blue and green
C) Green, purple, blue and yellow/orange
D) Black and white

What is depicted in the background of the photo?
A) A beach
B) A building and a tree
C) A street
D) A playground

What is the condition of the grass in the photo?
A) Overgrown and lush
B) Dry and patchy
C) Covered in snow
D) Full of flowers

What is the primary material of the sign?
A) Metal
B) Wood
C) Plastic
D) Stone

What can be seen behind the tree in the background?
A) A lake
B) A fence
C) A playground
D) A parking lot

What detail is painted on the post of the sign?
A) Polka dots
B) Stripes
C) Flowers
D) Leaves

What is the height of the sign relative to the tree?
A) Taller than the tree
B) The same height as the tree
C) Shorter than the tree
D) Not comparable

What element in the photo suggests it is taken outdoors?
A) The presence of grass and trees
B) The presence of a ceiling
C) The presence of indoor furniture
D) The presence of walls

What type of building is partially visible in the background?
A) A residential house
B) A commercial building
C) A school or institutional building
D) A shopping mall

What is the color of the tree trunk in the photo?
A) Green
B) Brown
C) Red
D) White

What is the condition of the sky in the photo?
A) Clear and blue
B) Cloudy
C) Stormy
D) Sunset

What is the primary color of the sign's background?
A) Red
B) Yellow
C) Green
D) Blue

What is the texture of the ground around the sign?
A) Rocky
B) Sandy
C) Grassy with patches of soil
D) Wet and muddy

What is the condition of the tree in the photo?
A) Dead
B) Healthy and full
C) Bare
D) Recently planted

What is the artistic style of the sign?
A) Abstract
B) Realistic
C) Cartoonish
D) Minimalist

What is the color of the paint on the sign's post?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Green, purple and Yellow/orange

How is the sign attached to the ground?
A) With nails
B) With a wooden post
C) With a metal stake
D) With concrete

What is the color of the text on the sign?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Yellow

What other elements are present in the photo besides the sign and tree?
A) A bench
B) A playground
C) A fence and a building
D) A water fountain

What is the color of the tree leaves in the photo?
A) Red
B) Yellow
C) Green
D) Brown

What is the overall theme of the photo?
A) Urban development
B) Nature and education
C) Art and culture
D) Commerce and trade

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A bench
B) A sign and grass
C) A pathway
D) A flower bed

What is the name written on the sign?
A) Groot
B) Sprout
C) Leafy
D) Barky

What color is the sign?
A) Blue
B) Yellow
C) Green
D) Red
